Module io.helidon.integrations.vault.secrets.database
Package io.helidon.integrations.vault.secrets.database

Interface DbSecrets

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Secrets
    public interface DbSecrets
extends Secrets
    Database secrets engine API.

    All methods block the current thread. This implementation is not suitable for reactive programming. Use DbSecretsRx in reactive code.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static Engine<DbSecretsRx> ENGINE
      Database secrets engine.
